name: 🅂🄽🄰🄸🄻 🅁🅄🄽
description:
Snail Run is a free simple 2D puzzle platformer where you play as a snail and must jump across platforms and solve puzzles in order to reach your goal, lunch. Perfect for beginners or people who just want to have a relaxing time.

Features:

  • 16 unique levels
  • unique puzzles
  • fun relaxing music
  • simple controls 

contact: Kwillo@outlook.com
